name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 本課程主要在導引學生經由傳統的繪圖觀念及技術，進入電腦繪圖的領域。訓練學生藉著繪圖軟體的功能，應用於建築設計與其他相關課程。教學內容為講授 Photoshop and SketchUp 指令及應用於建築基本繪圖的練習，以二度空間繪圖指令為主及 Photoshop and SketchUp 三度空間的繪圖指令與其他進階繪圖軟體之使用。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Holiday (No Class)
Week 03: Creating a Model and View
Week 04: Dimensioning and Annotating
Week 05: Holiday (No Class)
Week 06: Structural Items
Week 07: Ceiling and Interior
Week 08: Stairs, Ramps, and Railings
Week 09: Schedules and Tags
Week 10: Detailing
Week 11: Creating Specific Views and Match Lines
Week 12: Creating Sheets and Printing
Week 13: Creating Rooms and Area Plans
Week 14: Advanced Wall Topics
Week 15: Site and Topography
Week 16: Rendering and Presentation
Week 17: Project Collaboration
Week 18: Final Exam
